description:
Restoration of the building and change of use of the rear building and upper floors of the front building to provide 60 residential units, along with associated demolitions and alterations.  Small infill at ground floor level on frontage also proposed to provide retail use. (as amended by letter dated 04/07/96). 

 APPLICANTS PLAN NOS.:   SK01C, 02C, 03C, 04C, 05C, 06C, 07C,                         08C, 09C, 10C, 11B, 13B, 14C, 15D,                         16C, 1110 (facade), SK96 05/01,02,                         03A,04,O5,06
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: The development hereby permitted shall be begun not later than the expiration of five years from the date of this permission. 

 REASON: To comply with the provisions of Section 91(1) of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990.
